bibl.author: John M. Rogers

revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

body.p:
Your letter came to hand the first of this week and I was glad to hear from you but very sorry to hear of your loss of health & bereavement this liavesleaves me and family all well, my little Boy is growing very fast and is getting as fat as he can be WorkeWork is very duldull here I have only about two days work in a week and
the wages are small I do not everageaverage two dollars a day when I work I am working on locks I do not like the place here and shall get away from here as soon as I can How Is work there I can work at most any thing that comes along I should like very much to see you and if every thing goes well I may come on to see you this summer I got a little behind through the winter and have not quite caught up yet I have got a little BuisnessBusiness out side of my work which I do Evenings
I am connected with SoverernsSovereigns of Industry I Sell Butter & SigarsCigars and that helps me a great deal so that I manadgemanage to get along And I think by the first of June I shall be all square here We deal with a firm in PhiladefiaPhiladelphia Clothes Bennett & CoCompany Tower Hall I think it is in Market St.Street there is a Mr Walters with them and he is coming on here soon to take Orders and MeasamentMeasurement for the SovernsSovereigns Do you remember meeting a young Lady with me at the connircorner of Fulton and Court StsStreets once that is my wife she remembers you well so good bybye
for this time I will try to write oftener in future we all send love
